task.title: Add/Edit Tags
task.shortdesc: To help you manage your cloud's instances, images, and other Eucalyptus resources, you can optionally assign your own metadata to each resource in the form of tags. You can use tags to create user-friendly names, make resource searching easier, and improve coordination between multiple users. To add tags to this resource:

step.cmd: Type the key name for your tag into the Key text box.
Type the value for your tag into the Value text box.
If you wish to add additional tags, click the + (plus) button to the right of the Value text box.
If you wish to delete a tag that you've already entered, click the x button to the right of the tag.

taskbody.context: To edit one or more tags:

step.cmd: Move your mouse over the tag you wish to edit and click the pencil button to the right of the Value text box.
When you are finished editing tags, click the Save changes button to save your changes, or click the Cancel button to cancel.

taskbody.context: To delete one or more tags:

step.cmd: Move your mouse over the tag you wish to delete and click the - (minus) button to the right of the Value text box.
When you are finished deleting tags, click the Save changes button to confirm your deletions, or click the Cancel button to cancel.

taskbody.context: To delete one or more tags:

step.cmd: Move your mouse over the tag you wish to undelete and click the x button to the right of the Value text box.
